sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Action) Once per game session, the character may take a Bad Motivator action to make a Hard (3 difficulty dice) Mechanics check. If successful, one device (subject to the GM's approval) spontaneously fails due to the character's involvement, or because it was  bout to fail anyway and the character noticed it (this is the character's decision).</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Bad Motivator</name> <number>TAL0001158</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-13 19:13:32</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f04020122fbfd090e0f497eef699b63b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-02-19 06:46:50</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
